g.text: Problem: No current flow in circuit
Check: Open circuit, blown fuse, loose connections
Use: Continuity test, visual inspection, voltage measurement
Check: Short circuit, wrong resistance values
Solution: Verify R values, check for shorts, add protection
Check: Series/parallel connections, Kirchhoff's laws application
Problem: Poor power factor (high reactive power)
Solution: Add capacitor bank for PF correction
Check: Loose connections, unequal loads, phase sequence
Measure: Individual phase voltages and currents
Check: Turn ratio, insulation, core losses, overheating
Test: Open circuit, short circuit tests
Check: Phase failure, low voltage, rotor problems
Measure: Phase voltages, starting current, insulation
Problem: Excessive heating in magnetic cores
Solution: Use laminated cores, reduce operating frequency
Problem: Multimeter shows incorrect or unstable readings
Check: Battery level, range selection, lead connections, calibration, contact resistance
Problem: Measurements affecting circuit behavior (loading effect)
Use: High impedance instruments, appropriate range, minimal circuit disturbance
Follow: Lockout/tagout, proper PPE, voltage rating checks
Problem: Low solar panel output power
Check: Shading, dust, temperature, connections, panel degradation, MPPT operation
Problem: Wind turbine not generating expected power
Check: Wind speed, blade condition, gearbox, generator, control system
Monitor: SOC, voltage levels, temperature, cycle count
⚠️ EMERGENCY: Electrical shock, fire, or equipment failure
1. Disconnect power immediately 2. Ensure personal safety 3. Call emergency services 4. Provide first aid if qualified
